CellPattern.Name: EdgeWin
CellPattern.Description: Starting with the top row, 3 additional rotates will find all edge wins.

CellPattern.Name: MiddleWin
CellPattern.Description: Starting with the middle row selected, a single rotations finds both middle wins

CellPattern.Name: DiagonalWin
CellPattern.Description: Starting with the top-left to bottom-right diagonal, a single rotation finds both diagonal winning positions.

CellPattern.Name: TwoInARowTop
CellPattern.Description: Two marks top left, top middle with top right empty - and then a full rotation/flip scheme.

CellPattern.Name: TwoInARowMiddle
CellPattern.Description: Two in a row on the middle row, right side empty - finds all positions with 3 rotations.

CellPattern.Name: TwoInARowDiagonal
CellPattern.Description: Two in a row on the diagonal, with the third cell empty - finds all positions with 3 rotations.

CellPattern.Name: TwoOutsideTop
CellPattern.Description: Top left and top right filled, middle empty - finds all positions with 3 rotations.

CellPattern.Name: TwoOutsideMiddle
CellPattern.Description: Middle left and right, center empty - 1 rotation finds the one variation of the starting pattern.

CellPattern.Name: TowOutsideDiagonal
CellPattern.Description: Top left and bottom right with middle empty - 1 rotation finds the one variation of the starting pattern.
